PATIENT_ID: TEST_ROTEM_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-20 03:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-20 03:10:00
Category I activation for 28-year-old male with multiple gunshot wounds to abdomen.
Hemodynamically unstable. BP 70/40, HR 130, RR 28, GCS 14.
Massive Transfusion Protocol activated. ED blood box utilized.
Balanced blood resuscitation initiated for ongoing hemorrhage.

[LAB] 2026-01-20 03:20:00
ROTEM trauma panel ordered and drawn. Blue top tube collected.
Specimen hand-delivered to lab per protocol.
EXTEM CT: 92 sec (>80 → FFP administered).
EXTEM A10: 35 mm (<40 → evaluate FIBTEM A10).
FIBTEM A10: 8 mm (<10 → Cryoprecipitate given).
EXTEM ML: 12%.
ROTEM parameters documented and reviewed.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-20 03:45:00
Treatment decisions guided by ROTEM values.
FFP given for prolonged EXTEM CT.
Cryoprecipitate administered for low FIBTEM A10.
Bleeding controlled after targeted intervention.
